title: Device
description: Device properties as used by the allocation algorithm

deviceId.description: Unique identifier for this device, automatically generated

deviceIsMain.description: Whether it is the main device or an aux device

deviceCategory.description: Device category as detected by the application

deviceJoiningNumber.description: Original position in the joining order

deviceCurrentNumber.description: Current position in the joining order

deviceLatency.description: Emission delay, in milliseconds, if known

deviceGain.description: Calibration gain multiplier to be applied to the output from the device, if known

deviceTags.description: List of tag groups and the user selections applied to the device

items.description: The selection for a specific tag group

tagId.description: The unique identifier for this tag group

tagValues.description: The selections made for this tag group; this may be a default value if no selection was made
